title: OCE LoL Spring Qualifiers
body:
Your path to glory starts here!
_The Oceanic Spring Qualifiers is an upcoming League of Legends community-hosted tournament open to teams of all skill levels. We are an advocate for eSports in Oceania. The winner of the Spring Qualifiers will be granted free entry to our cash-prized tournament, which will be announced at a later date. The tournament is open to teams of all ranks and free to enter, however the prerequisites are:_
A level 30 League of Legends account.
Connected to the Oceania server in the League of Legends Client.
Minimum of 5 members in the roster will be deemed eligible for entry to the tournament.
> Please join the chatroom "ocespring" to get in contact with other team captains and tournament administrators. It will be used to report scores and resolve any possible problems and disputes.

**Game & Region: **League of Legends, Oceania
**Date & Time: **
Playoffs & Bronze Match: September 18th (Sunday), 1PM - 6PM
Finals: September 25th (Sunday), 1PM-5PM 
**Format: **5v5 Summoner's Rift, Tournament Draft, 16 teams
Playoffs: Best of 1, Single Elimination
Bronze Match: Best of 1, Single Elimination
Finals: Best of 3, Single Elimination
**Schedule:**
September 18th (Playoffs & Bronze Match):
11:00AM - 12:45PM: Check-in commences.
12:45PM - 01:00PM: Check-in finishes and tournament bracket is generated.
01:00PM - 02:00PM: Round of 16 starts.
02:00PM - 03:00PM: Round of 8 starts.
03:00PM - 04:00PM: Round of 4 starts.
04:00PM - 05:00PM: Bronze match is played.
September 25th (Finals):
01:00PM - 02:00PM: Game 1 is played.
02:00PM - 03:00PM: Game 2 is played.
03:00PM - 04:00PM: Game 3 is played.
Admins will contact winning teams and notify them of prize dates. The winning team will be granted a priority spot in our next pay-to-enter tournament containing cash prizes.
**Contact Us:**
If you need any assistance or clarification, contact us on our Facebook page: https://www.facebook.com/ocespringqualifiers/
Sign up on the Community Events page: http://events.oce.leagueoflegends.com/events/214401
Sign up on our tournament platform: http://challonge.com/ocespringqualifiers
Alternatively, add either lmperius or Support Leona through the League of Legends client.

**PRIZES:**

FIRST PLACE
1000 RP, Ryze, Triumphant Ryze, 4-Win IP Boost
SECOND PLACE – EIGHTH PLACE
4-Win IP Boost
Additional Prizes

1st: Free entry to our premium tournament held in the future, which will feature prizes in cash and Riot merchandise!
Additional prizes will be rewarded once the event is approved by Riot.
Viewers will be able to win OPL Mousepads on the day of the event through the stream link: twitch.tv/leonasupportcaster

replies.body: All the best to the champs
